thread.title: IGP: Cops probing IO in Balamurugan custodial death case
thread.title_full: IGP: Cops probing IO in Balamurugan custodial death case

title: IGP: Cops probing IO in Balamurugan custodial death case
text:
More 
The police is investigating one of its officers who is believed to have defied a court order for the release of detainee S Balamurugan, who died while in custody. 
Inspector-general Khalid Abu Bakar told a press conference at Bukit Aman today that the investigating officer is being probed under Section 345 of the Penal Code. 
"Police have started investigations under Section 345 of the Penal Code against the investigating officer for failing to abide by a court order to release the deceased (Balamurugan)," he said.
